translation:
Most Illustrious Sir

I place in Your Lordship's hands Your Lordship

On this premise, the government will immediately remove to São Gabriel the heaviest luggage, as well as the horses that are in São Sepé and Vacacaí.

It is therefore necessary and incumbent upon Your Lordship

God keep Your Lordship War Secretariat in Caçapava, May 27, 1840. Most Illustrious Sir Colonel João Antônio da Silveira. Serafim Joaquim de Alencastre
